review: Checked after midnight, really early this morning, and before work and it was priced 39 all those times with no indication of when it would be 24.  As soon as my lunch break started, I checked only to find it was 100% claimed, with a full waitlist, yet an advertisement with it saying as a prime member this deal is just for me!  WHAT A JOKE!  I have had my eye on it for awhile but was waiting for a sale.  I almost bought the other day then heard about Prime Day.  It was the only item I wanted today.  I think I will be buying either the chrome or roku sticks from another store instead, even though Amazons has more features. They are cheaper and the one time I thought I could get a good deal on this, I couldn't.  Unfortunately,  I have already paid my prime membership for the year just a couple months ago.  I will milk it for all its worth with free shipping and TV and movies, then never buy it again and probably not order from amazon.  I am even an amazon credit card holder, but from my experience and many other disappointed customer reviews I read today, they did not treat their customers right with their sales today.  Way to lose customers when they are trying to build up new prime members....losing old ones in process.  I read the reason they ran prime day was to be proactive against a competing company to launch later this year.  I am now interested in learning about the competing company and paying that membership when my prime expires!
author: booklover
